name: Bit Strike
description:
Platform: Android
Build: Unity3D
 Mini 2D game developed for mobile platforms. The game puts emphasis on precision and fast-paced action. Put your ability to the test, face off against difficult opponents and defeat all of them. GAMEPLAY

Stay alive until you beat an unknown enemy! Evade attacks and reflect back to the enemy. Destroy all the falling boxes before it reaches the green line. Otherwise, it will explode and you will be damaged and the enemy's health point will be regained. But if you can destroy the box instead, it will damage the enemy and increase your health point.

You can destroy all boxes by touch and hold on to the screen until you get the same number of the box you want to destroy. 

NOTE

This project is one of my personal projects to practice and improve my game development skills. This project is not intended for commercial purposes.
